metadata.description: Specifies the name of the Data Collection Rule to create.
Specifies the location in which to create the Data Collection Rule.
Specifies the Azure resource ID of the Log Analytics workspace to use.

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend ConditionalAccessPolicies = iif(ConditionalAccessPolicies has_cs "failure", ConditionalAccessPolicies, "[]")
| extend ConditionalPoliciesRemoved_CF = iif(ConditionalAccessPolicies has_cs "failure", false, true)
| project-away TenantId, SourceSystem, OperationName, OperationVersion, Category, DurationMs, ResourceGroup, Identity, Level, Location, AlternateSignInName, AuthenticationContextClassReferences, AuthenticationMethodsUsed, AuthenticationProcessingDetails, AuthenticationRequirementPolicies, HomeTenantName, IsInteractive, IsTenantRestricted, IsThroughGlobalSecureAccess, CreatedDateTime, FederatedCredentialId, GlobalSecureAccessIpAddress, IsRisky, ProcessingTimeInMs, MfaDetail, OriginalRequestId, SessionLifetimePolicies, SignInIdentifierType, TokenIssuerName
